Flow.description: Handles all actions related to a judgment - changes the amount passed into the judgment amount to always be the amount that accrues interest for both ODA and settlement

value.stringValue: IF ( ISBLANK ( [Judgement__c].ODA__c ) , NULL , IF ( ISBLANK ( [Judgement__c].ODA__c.Meeting__c ) , NULL , BLANKVALUE ( [Judgement__c].ODA__c.Meeting__c.Effective_Date__c , NULL ) ) )

formulas.expression: IF ( ISBLANK ( {!myVariable_current.ODA__c} ) , NULL , IF ( ISBLANK ( {!myVariable_current.ODA__c.Meeting__c} ) , NULL , BLANKVALUE ( {!myVariable_current.ODA__c.Meeting__c.Effective_Date__c} , NULL ) ) )

Flow.label: Judgment Process Builder
